name: Wheat
description: Wheat is a grass widely cultivated for its seed, a cereal grain which is a worldwide staple food.

name: Rice
description: Rice is a cereal grain and is the most widely consumed staple food for over half of the world's human population

name: Sugar
description: Sugar is the generic name for sweet-tasting, soluble carbohydrates, many of which are used in food. Table sugar, granulated sugar, or regular sugar, refers to sucrose, a disaccharide composed of glucose and fructose.

name: Lentil
description: The lentil (Lens culinaris or Lens esculenta) is an edible legume. It is an annual plant known for its lens-shaped seeds.

name: Cooking Oil
description: Sunflower oil used for cooking and frying
